data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade Bollaert-Delelis have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 7, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thomas Leonard awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Lens.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Facundo Medina (Lens) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 16, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lens close to the penalty box.
Reims are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
Tony Mauricio is booked for the home team.
In the minute 21, Lens have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
Lens's Simon Banza scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Tony Mauricio to set up the goal.
In the minute 23, Lens have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mathieu Cafaro gets his shot on target but fails to score for Reims.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Lens.
In Lens a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 29, Nathanael Mbuku for Reims is back on the field again.
Attention is being given to Reimsâ€™s Nathanael Mbuku and play has been suspended briefly.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 33, Free kick Reims.
Thomas Leonard signals a Reims throw-in in Lens's half.
Reims's Mathieu Cafaro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Throw-in for Reims in the half of Lens.
Reims to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Reims to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
Lens's Tony Mauricio gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Reims defender.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Lens.
Thomas Leonard signals a Reims throw-in in Lens's half.
Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
In the minute 43, Throw-in Reims.
Thomas Leonard awards the home team a throw-in.
Reims's Kaj Sierhuis gets in a shot on goal at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, In Lens Lens attack through Gael Kakuta. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lens.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Lens, Florian Sotoca (Lens) misses the target with a header.
Reims have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Lens.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Reims make their first substitution with Moussa Doumbia replacing Nathanael Mbuku.
Wout Faes (Reims) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Lens in the half of Reims.
Mathieu Cafaro grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 50, Lens to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Reims.
Thomas Leonard signals a Lens throw-in in Reims's half.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Goal! Boulaye Dia gives Reims a 1-2 lead in Lens.
That's a fine assist from Valon Berisha.
Lens advance rapidly upfield but Thomas Leonard blows for offside.
In the minute 55, Thomas Leonard awards Reims a goal kick.
Thomas Leonard awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Lens in the half of Reims.
In the minute 58, Tony Mauricio (Lens) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 61, Lens drive upfield and Steven Fortes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Reims defender.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
Lens's Facundo Medina breaks free at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 62, Thomas Leonard awards Reims a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Ismael Boura with Issiaga Sylla. This is the second substitution made today by Franck Haise.
David Guion (Reims) is making a second substitution, with El Bilal Toure replacing Kaj Sierhuis.
In the minute 63, The home team replace Tony Mauricio with Seko Fofana.
Lens have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Reims.
In the minute 67, Lens have been awarded a corner by Thomas Leonard.
Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Reims have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Moreto Cassama is replacing Mathieu Cafaro for the away team.
Lens are pushing forward but Gael Kakuta's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 73, Arnaud Kalimuendo is replacing Simon Banza for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Franck Haise is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade Bollaert-Delelis with David Da Costa replacing Steven Fortes.
Thomas Leonard signals a throw-in for Lens, close to Reims's area.
In the minute 76, Thomas Leonard signals a free kick to Reims.
Loic Bade (Lens) has received a yellow card from Thomas Leonard.
An unfortunate own goal by Thomas Foket makes the score 2-2.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Own goal! Facundo Medina has scored at the wrong end to make it 2-3.
Corentin Jean is on a sub for Gael Kakuta for Lens.
In the minute 81, Goal! Boulaye Dia extends Reims's lead to 2-4.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
In the minute 83, Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Reims.
In Lens Lens attack through David Da Costa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Dereck Kutesa is replacing Boulaye Dia for the away team.
In the minute 87, Lens are in shooting range from this free kick.
Lens push forward at Stade Bollaert-Delelis and Jonathan Clauss gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Reims defence.
Corner awarded to Lens.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Thomas Leonard will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Free kick Reims.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 4-4.
Florian Sotoca (Lens) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 3-4 at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Jonathan Clauss instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal! Florian Sotoca (Lens) levels the score at 4-4 with a header.
